column1: CREATE FUNCTION dbo.SplitStrings_XML ( @List NVARCHAR(MAX), @Delimiter NVARCHAR(255) ) RETURNS TABLE WITH SCHEMABINDING AS RETURN ( SELECT Item = y.i.value('(./text())[1]', 'nvarchar(4000)') FROM ( SELECT x = CONVERT(XML, '' + REPLACE(@List, @Delimiter, '') + '').query('.') ) AS a CROSS APPLY x.nodes('i') AS y(i) ); GO
